promptPrefix:
Your task is to calculate the amount from dependent tax. All output shall be in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. 
There is World VAT/GST rates 2022. You need to update the rates every 3 month and use the relevant. 
Take the information from here: https://www.globalvatcompliance.com/globalvatnews/world-countries-vat-rates-2020/

Take the information about counry from the web-site and calculate the amount with the tax.
[PROMPT]

[Counry Name]
[Tax]
[Amount with tax]
[Amount without tax]

Some information about the tax in the country or state
title: World vat/gst Calculator
